rule.name: Avoid short forms (don't etc.)
rule.message: Suggestion: use a long form like do not instead of don't for formal texts.
rule.example: Do not open the box unless you've read the instructions.
Don't open the box unless you've read the instructions.

rule.name: Avoid short forms (I'll etc.)
rule.message: Suggestion: use a long form like \1 will instead for formal texts.

rule.name: Avoid short forms (we've etc.)
rule.message: Suggestion: use a long form like \1 have instead for formal texts.
rule.example: Questions we have asked some people.

rule.name: Avoid short forms (we're etc.)
rule.message: Suggestion: use a long form like \1 are instead for formal texts.

rule.name: Avoid 'Or' at the beginning of a sentence
rule.message: Suggestion: don't start a sentence with or.
rule.example: Instead, one could think about other approaches.
Or one could think about other approaches.

rule.name: Avoid 'billion'
rule.message: Suggestion: use thousand million instead of billion to avoid ambiguities.
